MessageFormat:
Happy New Year {0} 🥳

Here's ya lunch group for January 🥙 Your suggested venue is {1}. Organise a date amongst yourselves, choose what you want from the menus (lunch or regular), then one of you send a message to the venue with your pre-order.

Remember to snap a photo with your group and post it in the lunch thread in Red Engine News/Social

If only three or fewer of you can make your lunch slide into Prof. Iterole's DMs and we'll try to combine you with another group.

Enjoy!
ReminderFormat: Reminder to get this booked in!
